title: Mid Tier Birthday

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player each night and attempt to guess their birthday. If youâ€™re successful, give them nothing. They will also receive a notification, being "*Happy birthday!*". c:

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not target yourself, and you may not target the same person more than once.
- You have a one-time Basic scumshield.
- You should probably just ask people for their birthday instead of actually guessing lol
- Once you reach your goal, everyone you guessed incorrectly will be roleblocked.
- You will appear as both 2126: Happy Birthday! and 2127: Unhappy Birthday to all investigative effects.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Give three people birthday NOTHING LMFAO.

desc:
Post 2128
*Birthdays are, like, whatever. Like, you're a year older. So what?*
